#summary CORE wiki home

= CORE Wiki =

This is the CORE wiki. It features tips and tricks and other bits of information that haven't made it into the [http://pf.itd.nrl.navy.mil/core/core-html/ CORE manual] ([http://pf.itd.nrl.navy.mil/core/core_manual.pdf PDF]) yet.

== Citations ==

Academic publications that use CORE are requested to cite one of the following publications:
 * J. Ahrenholz, T. Goff, and B. Adamson, Integration of the CORE and EMANE Network Emulators, IEEE Military Communications Conference 2011 (MILCOM), pp. 1870-1875, November 2011.
 * J. Ahrenholz, Comparison of CORE Network Emulation Platforms, Proceedings of IEEE MILCOM Conference, pp. 864-869, November 2010.
 * J. Ahrenholz, C. Danilov, T. Henderson, and J.H. Kim, CORE: A real-time network emulator, Proceedings of IEEE MILCOM Conference, 2008.
